t, q = map(int, raw_input().split())
arr = map(int, raw_input().split())
maximum, minimum = arr[0], arr[0]
for i in arr:
    if i > maximum:
        maximum = i
    if i < minimum:
        minimum = i
while q:
    query = input()
    if minimum <= query <= maximum:
        print 'Yes'
    else:
        print 'No'
    q -= 1
